description:
This code is duplicated in nova, cinder and ironic. Should be removed and use the common version on python-glanceclient once the code lands.

https://review.openstack.org/#/c/33327/
title: Duplicated glance image service

comments.content:
This code is duplicated in nova, cinder and ironic. Should be removed and use the common version on python-glanceclient once the code lands.

https://review.openstack.org/#/c/33327/

comments.content: Ghe, the patch in discussion currently is abandoned and has a -2. https://review.openstack.org/#/c/33327/  I am inclined to say this bug should be marked as incomplete until the glanceclient patch has landed.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~jogo

comments.content: Glance project is going to look this again, and that patch should be restored and updated in the following days. But yes, for now, is incompleted.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~ghe.rivero

comments.content: Hi! Any updates on this issue? Ghe, are you working on it? If not, could you please unassign yourself?
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~divius

comments.content:
Hi! As there was no new activity on this bug for a while, I'm unassigning it. Feel free to assign yourself, if you're still working on this bug.

And I'm also marking this as incomplete, as Glance patch does not seem to be restored.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~divius

comments.content: I think the bug submitter lost interest in fixing this issue (which is more like an enhancement to me)? I'll mark it as 'incomplete' in Cinder too till we hear back from Ghe.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~rushiagr

comments.content: We may need a collaboration for this.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~flwang

comments.content: [Expired for Ironic because there has been no activity for 60 days.]
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~janitor

comments.content: Closing stale bug. If this is still an issue please reopen.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~sean-mcginnis

comments.content: This has been marked incomplete in glance for well over two years. I'm closing this as invalid as there has been no activity other than other projects cleaning up their own trackers.
